Class WordleModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.WordleModel
public class WordleModel extends Observable

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WordleModel(String answer, int maxRows)
    This creates a wordle model which represents the correct wordle word It has useful functions for handling guesses against the word

      public INDEX_RESULT[] getGuessedCharacters()

      Gets the progress of the game so far. This is used to display
      Returns:

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()

    • handleGuess

      public void handleGuess(String guess)
      This handles a guess against the model. It analyzes the word to determine the validity of each letter. It uses this to update the information about the guessed letters and it returns a new guess object which holds the needed information about the guess.
      Parameters:
      guess - the word being guessed
